thread.title: TV | Back To The Future Trilogy
thread.title_full: TV | Back To The Future Trilogy - entertainment.ie

author: Brian Lloyd
title: TV | Back To The Future Trilogy
text: As today is Back To The Future Day, ITV is showing all three Back To The Future films. Trying saying that quickly. Anyway, the fun kicks off at 4.30PM with the first (and, in our opinion, the best) of the bunch, followed by Back To The Future II at 6.50PM and, at 10.30PM, Back To The Future III. Bonus points if you can name the band that had a cameo in Back To The Future III.
